ResearchTabDef.label: beyond
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Unlock solar, quasaric, tenebrite, and umbra technologies by researching at a hi-tech research bench. You can only have one active project at a time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a solar analyzer, which models this world's sun to aid research and unlock solar-tier research projects. Reverse-engineer the secrets of Solar Republic society through the study of heliophysics.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: In walking the footsteps of the original Solarites, you have learned the secrets of sunsteel. A crude method of manufacturing your own sunsteel is now available at your smelters, smithies, and fabrication benches. These facilities are not properly equipped to perform this process, and using them to produce sunsteel is rather inefficient.\n\nOnce you have enough, it is recommended that you use your sunsteel to construct the Sun Forge, a crafting apparatus that specializes in Sunsteel manufacture.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nuclear metallurgy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce sunsteel from plasteel, gold, and uranium at a smelter. Build the sunsteel shaper to form sunsteel into solarite buildings and weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar energy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Generate power the way Solarites do: splitting their sunsteel in a specially-tooled reactor. Craft Solarite fuel rods for use in the Solarite reactor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build stronger batteries from sunsteel to hold greater amounts of power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: strong force manipulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harness the strong nuclear force to stitch neutrons into the ultra-dense Neutronium. You can already control the electromagnetic force with the literal flick of a switch; why stop at mastery over one fundamental force? Imagine - a neutron star in your own backyard!
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Neutronosynthesis, ("n-synthesis"), is the process of turning stuff into neutronium, storing it, then turning it into better stuff. Most of the neutronium used in final products is lost to radiation, making n-synthesis a rather wasteful process. N-synthesis requires special infrastructure - refineries, synthesizers, storage, and pipes - made from materials at least as strong as sunsteel. Some high-tech items are only possible through n-synthesis. Improperly storing neutronium can be catastrophic; the decompression alone is enough to level entire cities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Manufacture power armor typical of Solarite military personnel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build weapons that exploit the inherent instability of sunsteel for ease-of-use, efficiency, and extreme violence.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar medicine production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce medicinal products on-par with Solarite nation-states at the Solar medical fabricator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build Solarite body parts to replace missing appendages and organs or supplant natural flesh. Requires nanoclusters and a skilled doctor to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar drug production
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Produce drugs found among Solarite communities.
Aegis is a powerful disease prevention drug that blocks many common ailments - including infection - before they are contracted, more so than penoxycyline.
Sunlite is a euphoria-inducing drink refined from sunweave. While it reduces the need for rest and suppresses pain, it is extremely addictive, albeit less so than psychite-based drugs.
Trot is a synthetic combat drug used by Solarite militaries to improve shooting, melee, and movement while dulling pain in the user.
Wide-a-wake is a productivity-enhancement drug which significantly reduces the users need to sleep.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar recreation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Match your technological prowess with the equivalent recreational facilities. After all, all work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build sunsteel hydroponics basins to better cultivate crops indoors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic n-synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute neutronium into any material known to you. Through induced beta-decay, your refineries can shift neutronium into any element, in any configuration.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasaric analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a quasaric analyzer, which simulates the quasi-stellar object at the center of your galaxy to aid research and unlock quasar-tier research projects. The Kwazaari will enjoy their monopoly no longer.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You are now able to inefficiently forge Quasar Alloy. Recipes for it can be found at the Sunsteel Shaper.

ResearchProjectDef.label: accretic condenser
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce quasar alloy from sunsteel, gold, and uranium at a sunsteel shaper. Build the neutronium refabricator and theta forge to craft quasar alloy products. Craft Kwazaari universal parts, uniquely-tooled components for most quasar buildings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar energy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Generate power in amounts fit to compete with the Kwazaari Corporation themselves. Build a neutronium reactor to exploit the unique interaction between dissoluted neutronium and the permittivity of quasar alloy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build stronger batteries from quasar alloy to hold ever-greater amounts of power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Manufacture power armor typical of Kwazaari private military contractors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft Kwazaari weapons that utilize the superior properties of quasar alloy to secure greater profits at any cost.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar medicine production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce medical items common to Kwazaari Quiklinic-brand private healthcare facilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build Kwazaari body parts to replace missing appendages and organs or supplant natural flesh. Requires picoclusters and a skilled doctor to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar drug production
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Produce drugs found among Kwazaari employees and corpo-slaves alike.
Castra is a powerful disease prevention drug that blocks many common ailments - including infection - before they are contracted, more so than Aegis.
Sunlight is a euphoria-inducing drink refined from sunweave. While it reduces the need for rest and suppresses pain, it is addictive, albeit less so than sunlite.
Canter is a synthetic combat drug used by Solarite militaries to improve shooting, melee, and movement while dulling pain in the user.
Sleepquitin is a productivity-enhancement drug which almost removes the users need to sleep.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar recreation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build recreational facilities comparable to those of Kwazaari C-suite executives. Lucky!

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build the superior hydroponics system from quasar alloy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard n-synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build the [missing] refinery, which uses quasar alloy and Kwazaari universal parts to lose less neutronium during the synthesis stage, granting you much more efficient neutronosynthesis recipes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: galactic analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a dark mirror, an extreme astronomical device that scrutinizes interstellar space for insights into dark matter. The dark mirror greatly aids your research and unlocks Tenebral research projects. In emulating Tenebral society you may, one day, join them.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You are now able to inefficiently form tenebrite crystals. Recipes for it can be found at the neutronium refabricator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gravitic crystal shaping
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce tenebrite, a crystalline material derived from quasar alloy and stray dark matter. Craft crystalline joints from tenebrite, crucial components in tenebrite products. Build tenebrite structures and craft tenebrite tools and weapons; they will be supreme to nearly all others.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite energy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build the dark reactor, which captures energy from stray, non-interacting particles to freely generate power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build tenebral batteries to store supreme amounts of power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fabricate tenebral power armor, a shadowy suit of armor to set your footing equal to Tenebral communes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft weapons of Mass Destruction and Mass-Destruction utilizing your new Tenebrite materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite medicine production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce dark medicine, the tenebral medical fabricator, and femtoclusters: small machines that give your doctors agency in small places, needed for tenebral medical procedures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build tenebral body parts to supersede natural flesh. Requires femtoclusters and a skilled doctor to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite drug production
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Produce drugs commonly enjoyed in tenebral space communes.
Pax is a powerful disease prevention drug that blocks virtually all ailments - including infection and neurodegenerative disorders like dementia.
Crewmates are euphoria-inducing gummy candies refined from sunweave. While they reduce the need for rest and suppress pain, they are addictive, albeit less so than sunlight. Note: keep away from children!
Gallop is a synthetic combat psychedelic/steroid used by tenebral offensive units to improve shooting, melee, and movement while all-but-negating pain in the user... sometimes also used recreationally by the affluent within Tenebral Society.
Adreamoline is a productivity-enhancement drug which negates the user's need to sleep.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite recreation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build recreational facilities you might find in Tenebral apartments. They frequently go unused in their namesake's abode; perhaps you can make better use of them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tenebrite hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build the superior hydroponics system from tenebrite crystals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high n-synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build the [missing] refinery, which uses quasar alloy and Kwazaari universal parts to lose less neutronium during the synthesis stage, granting you much more efficient neutronosynthesis recipes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: laborless neutronium brew
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the umbral neutronium self-sustained generator, which turns energy into neutronium and other materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultimate research gate
ResearchProjectDef.description: All of your technological efforts so far have been toward recreating preestablished human tech. But now, you have reached the end of rediscovery. Now is the opportunity for something yours - something new. What was once beyond your reach is now yours for the taking.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unlimited power
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the umbral reactor, a source of free energy (as far as you're concerned).

ResearchProjectDef.label: unlimited production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the umbral creation engine, which turns energy into neutronium and other materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: umbral bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Does nothing right now!

ResearchProjectDef.label: self-sustaining production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the umbral forge, which turns energy into neutronium and other materials.
